title: Am I synced?
body:
Decided to give erigon a try on mainnet. Have only used geth before. After syncing for about 4 days, I am getting strange logs and am not sure if they are normal or I am stuck in some sort of infinite syncing loop. See below:
```
[INFO] [03-14|22:27:48.831] [2/15 Headers] Handling new payload      height=16829154 hash=0xacb566a18f4aecf2699e879da5ed10085ef9f356d809b1b42045b708ef1a1b5a
[INFO] [03-14|22:27:49.016] [2/15 Headers] Waiting for Consensus Layer... 
[INFO] [03-14|22:27:49.096] [2/15 Headers] Fork choice update: flushing in-memory state (built by previous newPayload) 
[INFO] [03-14|22:27:49.290] Commit cycle                             in=42.847833ms
[INFO] [03-14|22:27:49.290] Timings (slower than 50ms)               Headers=190ms
[INFO] [03-14|22:27:49.290] Tables                                   PlainState=89.7GB AccountChangeSet=1.5GB StorageChangeSet=2.7GB BlockTransaction=26.1GB TransactionLog=373.8GB FreeList=44.7MB ReclaimableSpace=44.7GB
[INFO] [03-14|22:27:49.290] RPC Daemon notified of new headers       from=16829153 to=16829154 hash=0xacb566a18f4aecf2699e879da5ed10085ef9f356d809b1b42045b708ef1a1b5a header sending=26.29µs log sending=410ns
[INFO] [03-14|22:27:49.355] [2/15 Headers] Waiting for Consensus Layer... 


[INFO] [03-14|22:28:00.270] [2/15 Headers] Handling new payload      height=16829155 hash=0x6d379be67baa6a00b9069d14f1399484f1a2fa0884c220452ce8e3b3bbd5a0af
[INFO] [03-14|22:28:00.401] [2/15 Headers] Waiting for Consensus Layer... 
[INFO] [03-14|22:28:00.461] [2/15 Headers] Fork choice update: flushing in-memory state (built by previous newPayload) 
[INFO] [03-14|22:28:00.611] Commit cycle                             in=91.746891ms
[INFO] [03-14|22:28:00.611] Timings (slower than 50ms)               Headers=86ms
[INFO] [03-14|22:28:00.611] Tables                                   PlainState=89.7GB AccountChangeSet=1.5GB StorageChangeSet=2.7GB BlockTransaction=26.1GB TransactionLog=373.8GB FreeList=44.8MB ReclaimableSpace=44.8GB
[INFO] [03-14|22:28:00.611] RPC Daemon notified of new headers       from=16829154 to=16829155 hash=0x6d379be67baa6a00b9069d14f1399484f1a2fa0884c220452ce8e3b3bbd5a0af header sending=30.111µs log sending=540ns
[INFO] [03-14|22:28:00.666] [2/15 Headers] Waiting for Consensus Layer... 


[INFO] [03-14|22:28:12.537] [2/15 Headers] Handling new payload      height=16829156 hash=0xccbe5870283361061592ed02f018abaf34d01a0c8a52d3483b455ad7db42f109
[INFO] [03-14|22:28:12.705] [2/15 Headers] Waiting for Consensus Layer... 
[INFO] [03-14|22:28:12.769] [2/15 Headers] Fork choice update: flushing in-memory state (built by previous newPayload) 
[INFO] [03-14|22:28:12.925] Commit cycle                             in=91.045652ms
[INFO] [03-14|22:28:12.925] Timings (slower than 50ms)               Headers=93ms
[INFO] [03-14|22:28:12.925] Tables                                   PlainState=89.7GB AccountChangeSet=1.5GB StorageChangeSet=2.7GB BlockTransaction=26.0GB TransactionLog=373.8GB FreeList=44.8MB ReclaimableSpace=44.8GB
[INFO] [03-14|22:28:12.925] RPC Daemon notified of new headers       from=16829155 to=16829156 hash=0xccbe5870283361061592ed02f018abaf34d01a0c8a52d3483b455ad7db42f109 header sending=33.921µs log sending=380ns
[INFO] [03-14|22:28:13.010] [2/15 Headers] Waiting for Consensus Layer... 
```

```
> erigon --version
erigon version 2.40.1-stable-94b4cee5
```

```
> lighthouse --version
Lighthouse v3.5.1-319cc61
BLS library: blst-modern
SHA256 hardware acceleration: true
Allocator: jemalloc
Specs: mainnet (true), minimal (false), gnosis (false)
```

The `eth_syncing` rpc call returns `false`, but `[2/15 Headers]` worries me.

BTW, is there something similar to `geth attach` console in erigon?

Oh, and I would like to ask this in discord as suggested, but the invite is expired.

- you are synced
- `geth attach` - we don't have, but most of the RPC methods we support
- discord - follow Readme to get new invite
